summary: Twenty five years on, the original cast and crew look back on the John Landis classic, An American Werewolf In London.
cast: Paul Davis|Jenny Agutter|David Schofield|Robert Paynter|Rick Baker|John Woodvine|David Naughton|John Landis|George Folsey Jr.|Griffin Dunne|David Tringham|Deborah Nadoolman|Leslie Dilley|Malcolm Campbell|Robin Grantham|Beryl Lerman|Joseph Ross|Ray Andrew|Tom Hester|Bill Sturgeon|Brenda Cavendish|Michael Carter|Dennis Fraser|Linzi Drew|Joyce Herlihy|Vic Armstrong|Maria Ouspenskaya
keywords: film critic|film premiere|movie location|location shooting|behind the scenes
title: Beware the Moon: Remembering 'An American Werewolf in London'
